meanings.definition: A type of durable, coarse cotton fabric.
meanings.sent1: She wore a dress made of dungaree, which felt rough but sturdy.
meanings.sent2: The workers used dungaree to make strong bags for carrying heavy items.
meanings.sent3: The dungaree fabric was so tough, it could probably withstand a dragon's claws!
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, dungaree is like the superhero cape of fabrics.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the dungaree reminded him of hard work and resilience.

meanings.definition: A pair of pants or overalls made from dungaree fabric.
meanings.sent1: He put on his favorite dungaree overalls before heading out to work in the garden.
meanings.sent2: The children happily played in the mud, their dungarees getting dirtier by the minute.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her dungaree pants were so comfy, she could sleep in them all night.
meanings.sent4: The dungaree overalls were like a second skin, protecting him as he worked under the scorching sun.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the dungaree rubbing against itself was a comforting rhythm as he walked.
